title: Very Tiny League client window
body:
Is this a patch issue?

My Display of windows 10 is set perfectly like before & got my AMD Radeon settings back, but now since my last game my lol client went very tiny almost the size of a phone SG7 or such.

Any fixed much appreciate

replies.body:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kPB2gDV.jpg[/img]. 

You can't resize anything on this client. (before you said it's my computer resolution I'm tried all of them).

You can resize the client (unless it's the Alpha) by grabbing a corner of it and dragging it outwards. 

http://www.computerhope.com/issues/pictures/resize.jpg

Let me know if you continue to have an issue. If you do, please [provide a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of what you're seeing.
Anyone I can't reported feeders or trolls in-game or give honor to players
